desc: 攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ＆攻撃力を５０％アップ

dictionary.lore: A divine blade said to grant the power to rule the heavens to its wielder. It was capable of immense destruction, and tales state that its power could distort the flow of time. Legend holds that many gods gave their lives to create this divine blade, and that the will of the gods within it can overcome and control the bodies of any weak-willed individuals who hold it.

name: 統天刻剣ザルスゾード
